00027 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00028 {
00029   createinfo(argc, argv);
00030 
00031   int origin=0;
00032   int invert=0;
00033   int timerevert=0;
00034   int orientinertia=0;
00035   int orientmaxinertia=0;
00036   int orientangular=0;
00037 
00038   double d[3] = {0.0, 0.0, 0.0};
00039   double v[3] = {0.0, 0.0, 0.0};
00040   double alpha=0.0, beta=0.0, gamma=0.0;
00041   double scale=0.0;
00042   
00043   int c, i;
00044 
00045   if (argc < 3) {
00046     fprintf(stderr, "Usage: %s [OPTIONS] Nuc transformedNuc\n"
00047             "\n  -o                      move to origin in phase-space"
00048             "\n  -p                      invert Nuc"
00049             "\n  -T                      timerevert Nuc"
00050             "\n  -s SCALE                scale lengths by SCALE"
00051             "\n  -t X,Y,Z                move Nuc by (X,Y,Z)"
00052             "\n  -b VX,VY,VZ             boost Nuc by (VX,VY,VZ)"
00053             "\n  -r ALPHA,BETA,GAMMA     rotate Nuc by ALPHA, BETA, GAMMA (degrees)"
00054             "\n  -I                      orient along inertia tensor"
00055             "\n  -M                      orient along maximal inertia axis"
00056             "\n  -J                      orient along angular momenta\n",
00057             argv[0]);
00058     exit(-1);
00059   }
00060 
00061   /* manage command line options */
00062 
00063   while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "opTs:t:b:r:IMJ")) != -1)
00064     switch (c) {
00065     case 'o':
00066       origin = 1;
00067       break;
00068     case 'p':
00069       invert = 1;
00070       break;
00071     case 'T':
00072       timerevert = 1;
00073       break;
00074     case 's':
00075       scale = atof(optarg);
00076       break;
00077     case 't':
00078       sscanf(optarg, "%lf,%lf,%lf", &d[0], &d[1], &d[2]);
00079       break;
00080     case 'b':
00081       sscanf(optarg, "%lf,%lf,%lf", &v[0], &v[1], &v[2]);
00082       break;
00083     case 'r':
00084       sscanf(optarg, "%lf,%lf,%lf", &alpha, &beta, &gamma);
00085       alpha *= M_PI/180;
00086       beta *= M_PI/180;
00087       gamma *= M_PI/180;
00088       break;
00089     case 'I':
00090       orientinertia = 1;
00091       break;
00092     case 'M':
00093       orientmaxinertia = 1;
00094       break;
00095     case 'J':
00096       orientangular = 1;
00097       break;
00098     }
00099      
00100  
00101   char* Qfile = argv[optind];
00102   char* transQfile = argv[optind+1];
00103 
00104   SlaterDet Q;
00105   SlaterDetAux X;
00106   readSlaterDetfromFile(&Q, Qfile);
00107 
00108   initSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
00109   calcSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
00110 
00111   if (origin) {
00112     calcCMPosition(&Q, &X, d);
00113     calcCMVelocity(&Q, &X, v);  
00114 
00115     for (i=0; i<3; i++) 
00116       v[i] *= -1;
00117     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00118       d[i] *= -1;
00119   }
00120 
00121   if (orientinertia) {
00122     double alpha0, beta0, gamma0;
00123     calcSpatialOrientation(&Q, &X, &alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
00124     alpha=-gamma0; beta=-beta0; gamma=-alpha0;
00125   }
00126 
00127   if (orientmaxinertia) {
00128     double alpha0, beta0, gamma0;
00129     calcOrientedOrientation(&Q, &X, &alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
00130     alpha=-gamma0; beta=-beta0; gamma=-alpha0;
00131   }
00132 
00133   if (orientangular) {
00134     double alpha0, beta0, gamma0;
00135     calcSpinOrientation(&Q, &X, &alpha0, &beta0, &gamma0);
00136     alpha=-gamma0; beta=-beta0; gamma=-alpha0;
00137   }
00138 
00139   if (scale > 0.0)
00140     scaleSlaterDet(&Q, scale);
00141 
00142   if (invert)
00143     invertSlaterDet(&Q);
00144 
00145   if (timerevert)
00146     timerevertSlaterDet(&Q);
00147 
00148   rotateSlaterDet(&Q, alpha, beta, gamma);
00149   boostSlaterDet(&Q, v);
00150   moveSlaterDet(&Q, d);
00151 
00152   Parameterization P = ParameterizationFMD;
00153   Para q;
00154   SlaterDetinitFMD(&Q, &q);
00155 
00156   // write transformed SlaterDet parameters
00157   
00158   FILE* outfp;
00159  
00160   fprintf(stderr, "... writing transformed SlaterDet to file %s\n", transQfile);
00161   if (!(outfp = fopen(transQfile, "w"))) {
00162     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", transQfile);
00163     exit(-1);
00164   }
00165 
00166   fprintinfo(outfp);
00167 
00168   fprintf(outfp, "\n# Parameterization\n");
00169   fprintf(outfp, "<Parameterization %s>\n", P.name);
00170   P.Parawrite(outfp, &q);
00171 
00172   fprintf(outfp, "\n# SlaterDet\n");
00173   writeSlaterDet(outfp, &Q);
00174 
00175   fclose(outfp);
00176 
00177   return 0;
00178 }
